page.title: 17POPULATION 2 MIGRATION/EMP'T
page.content: {IMMIGRATION:}52% of local residents were born within 10 miles of our area, 13% between 10 and 20 miles, 6% 20 to 50 miles, 22% more than 50 miles and 5% in other Commonwealth countries. {EMIGRATION:}4% have a desire to move within a radius of 20 miles. {EMPLOYMENT:}35% of residents are full time employees, 8% part time, 6% are unemployed, 16% are retired or school age. The other 35% are housewives.{ {CHILDREN:}5% go to playgroups, 7% to Infant Schools, 33% to Primary School, 48% to Secondary Schools and 4% follow Further Education.{ {FAMILIES:}15% have 1 child, 52% have 2 children, 17% have 3 and 11% have 4 or more. 3% of the families are single parent. 2% of the families have grand parents living with them. There are 2 residential homes for the elderly. {SEE POPULATION 1 BIRTHS AND DEATHS.}
